short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings a refreshing and vibrant look to your browser with a stunning image

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This theme creates a sense of tranquility and connection to nature, offering a soothing browsing experience. Its minimalist design highlights a harmonious blend of deep and bright green tones, making interface elements stand out.

Key features:
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Customizable search bar and shortcuts.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
